side_panel_note: Danna-dama akan alamar ƙara a mashaya na'urar bincike kuma zaɓi "Bude gefen panel". Wannan zai ba ka damar kewaya ta cikin shafuka daban-daban da gidajen yanar gizo yayin da kake ci gaba da ganin BlockBird ɗinka.
about_note: BlockBird wani ƙarfafa kuma mai sauƙin amfani da ƙarin na'urar bincike ce ta Chrome, Brave, da Kiwi da aka gina ta al'umma. An tsara shi don inganta kwarewar bincikenka na blockchain.
setup_blockbird: Danna nan don saita BlockBird ɗinka
updates: Danna don ziyartar changelog ɗinmu kuma duba sabbin sabuntawa.
scanner_description: Binciki shafin don alamun airdrop ko tsarin maki.
our_scan_found_no_signs: Bincikenmu bai samu wasu alamun airdrop ko tsarin maki ba.
error_scanning_page: Kuskure a wajen binciken shafin. Ba za a iya bincika wannan nau'in shafin yanar gizon ba.
explore_description: Wani jerin masu bincike na blockchain mai iya bincike.
wallets_description: Sarrafa walat ɗin ku na crypto don sauƙin kwafin/adana.
label: Lakabi
token_info: Token: An loda sabon token goma na Solana da Jupiter ta tabbatar. Yi amfani da binciken don nemo wasu token na Solana.
lst_info: LST: Duk LSTs (Liquid Staking Tokens) da Sanctum ya jera.
token_disclaimer: Ba mu da alaƙa da Solana, Jupiter, ko Sanctum.
